name: HEROES, INC.: THE GAME for iOS
blurb: Side scrolling action packed endless gameplay style, starring an all new super hero team known to the world as "Heroes, Inc.".

rewards.reward: SPECIAL HEROES:\r\nOur eternal gratitude for your support. Without you Heroes, Inc. will not be possible. Your name will go in the 'Special Thanks To' section in the game for your support and appreciation. Thank you so much!

BORN HEROES:
Your name in the 'Special Thanks To' section in the game for your support and appreciation. 
PLUS a digital POSTER, GAME COVER and some original CONCEPT ART. All delivered digitally for your viewing pleasure. PROMO CODE to download the game upon its release.
Thank you so much for your support.

SPECIAL PRICE TIER!------------SUPER POWER: Your name in the 'Special Thanks To' section in the game credits + a kickstarter exclusive Heroes, Inc. ART BOOK including a short full colour comic, character art and all the concept art that went into creating the game + the game sound track download + Download the game for free. All delivered digitally. Thank you so much for your support!

GET PHYSICAL: Your name in the 'Special Thanks To' section in the game credits + a kickstarter exclusive Heroes, Inc. ART BOOK including a short full colour comic, character art and all the concept art that went into creating the game (digital download) + the game sound track download + a high quality (Cardstock- 80# Cover Gloss-216 gsm) mini poster of the game cover art delivered to your door + Free game download. PLUS your name highlighted beautifully in the game credits 'Special Thanks To' section. Thank you so much for your support!

COMIC HERO: Everything in the GET PHYSICAL tier PLUS a high quality printed game ART BOOK including the game comic, character illustrations, concept art and RunAway Studios promotional stickers included with the art book. Thank you so much for your support!

HERO ARTIST: Your name elaborated in the 'Special Thanks To' section in the game credits + Heroes, Inc. ART BOOK including a short full colour comic, character art and all the concept art that went into creating the game + the game sound track download + a high quality (Cardstock- 80# Cover Gloss-216 gsm) mini poster of the game cover art PLUS a SPECIAL EDITION hand drawn and signed full colour sketch card (any one of the game characters of your choice) from our concept artist, all delivered to your door + Free game download. Thanks you so much for your support!

SUPER HERO: Get everything from the HERO ARTIST tier + a Heroes, Inc. iPhone case (your choice of character) for your iPhone 4/4s or 5 PLUS a 4.5 inch tall sticker of one of the game characters. Thank you so much for your support!
HERO TEE: ALL above rewards + a SPECIAL EDITION full colour printed high quality Heroes, Inc. TEE SHIRT. Thank you for all your support!

EXTREEM VALUE REWARD PACK!-------FULL ON!: All bove mentioned digital downloads + All above mentioned physical rewards including: Poster, Art Book, Sketch Card, Stickers, iPhone case and Tee-Shirt + an EXCLUSIVE 3D printed HEXCLAST figurine, 3D printed with full colour and high detail sandstone material. This is the real deal! Thank you so much!
THE EXECUTIVE: All above mentioned digital AND physical rewards + your name in the credits as the EXECUTIVE PRODUCER of the game. Thank you so much for your support!
All above physical and digital rewards + design an in-game obstacle with us in one of the three gameplay scenes.

YOU THE HERO: All the digital and physical rewards + we add a new playable super hero in the game according to your specification. You can name it, help us design the costume and we can even make it look like you. The possibilities are only limited by imagination. Be creative. Thank you so much for all your support!
